short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans the visible list of Github repos, and highlights which ones have been recently updated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are on a webpage which lists a large number of Github repos, there's nothing worse than clicking through to each one only to find out they haven't been updated in 5 years. This extension gives you a button to click which will check the last commit date on all repos currently in the viewport. It then highlights the link as green (updated within last 6 months), yellow (6-18 months), or red (older than 18 months)
